EmailTemplate.description: Used when the SM Price is required
EmailTemplate.name: SM Price Required
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Manager Price required for Opportunity: {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi ,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} has requested for the Sales Manager price for the {!Opportunity.Name}, Account Name:- {!Opportunity.Account}.
Opportunity {!Opportunity.Link}.
